{"id":931790492,"question_id":2715,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1681203713,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/931790492/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"K Items With the Maximum Sum","memory":"40.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int kItemsWithMaximumSum(int numOnes, int numZeros, int numNegOnes, int k) {\n        \n        int sum =0;\n        \n         while(k>0){\n             \n             if(numOnes>0){\n                 numOnes--;\n                 sum+=1;\n             }else if(numZeros>0){\n                 numZeros--;\n             }else{\n                 numNegOnes--;\n                 sum--;\n             }\n             \n             k--;\n         }\n        \n        return sum;\n            \n            \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"k-items-with-the-maximum-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
